jobs.title: Meaningful benefits
jobs.description: Navigate life’s most important moments with benefits designed to give you what you need to focus on what matters most (because we know there’s more to life than work).
requirements: Toast to your healthFully paid health coverage for you and your family, in many locations.
Craft your calendarFlexible location and schedule for most roles.
Create space for youDistributed by design workforce, plus generous number of vacation days each year.
Embrace parenthoodMinimum of 16 weeks of parental leave, plus generous family formation benefits.
Give back your time40 hours each year to use toward volunteering with organizations and causes you’re passionate about.

jobs.title: The source of a successful career
jobs.description: All companies have values, at Elastic, we live them. Enter our Source Code: the set of ideas that make Elastic what it is, and it’s also what empowers you to be you, at work and beyond.

jobs.title: Elastic’s culture makes it possible
jobs.description: "As long as I get my work done, I have a lot of control over my schedule, that’s huge for me. The working from home aspect makes it possible for me to be a career person and a mom at the same time. If it wasn’t for that flexibility I would have to choose."

jobs.title: Resources to learn
jobs.description: Here at Elastic, we understand the value of having just the right amount of information at our fingertips.
requirements: MeetupsRegister for our upcoming events. Elastic meetups are the place to learn from the creators of the Elastic Stack, as well as your fellow developers.Join now
Community YouTubeThere's something for everyone on our channel with series and content for total beginners and experts alike in more than seven languages.Watch now
Community newsletterWe understand the value of having just the right amount of information at our fingertips. Our quarterly community newsletter delivers just that.Subscribe now

jobs.title: TIMESAVER
jobs.description: No more jumping from app to app to perform multiple searches when looking for content. Build customizable employee search with semantic search, conversational question-answering, filtering and faceting, and typeahead suggestions to help teams find information fast. Flexible search APIs give your intranet and employee experience platforms a single source of truth.

jobs.title: Elasticsearch Labs
jobs.description: Learn how to build the most innovative workplace search experiences by staying up-to-date with new research and examples on generative AI, vector search, and machine learning.

jobs.title: Generative AI
jobs.description: Integrate Elastic with generative AI to build mobile, website portal, Slackbot integrations, and other employee experiences. Use your organization’s proprietary data and process documentation to personalize responses that precisely address employee needs, while maintaining document-level security and keeping costs low.

jobs.title: TOTAL ECONOMIC IMPACT™
jobs.description: Forrester Consulting's commissioned study of Elasticsearch concluded that customers save 24 hours per year per employee. Learn how your organization can improve its productivity and employee retention with Elastic.

jobs.title: Application
jobs.description: Quality over quantity: Apply only to roles you are truly interested in and that align with your experience. Take the time to tailor your resume/CV to the open role you are applying for, and be specific about projects you have worked on or managed. Cover letters are not required, but we welcome anything you can provide to help us learn more about you!

jobs.title: Recruiter screen
jobs.description: Expected duration: 30 minutes

jobs.title: Offer
jobs.description: After the interview process is done, we will meet internally and review everything from your application and interviews. If we decide you are the best candidate for the role, a recruiter will reach out with an offer.

jobs.title: Onboarding
jobs.description: Once you have accepted an offer, we will reach out with information on compensation and benefits, a start date, and other details to bring you in as a new Elastician!
